医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，模仿禁食饮食可降低生物年龄和疾病风险南加州大学伦纳德·戴维斯老年学学院领导的一项新研究表明，模仿禁食的饮食周期可以减少人类免疫系统衰老的迹象，以及胰岛素抵抗和肝脏脂肪，从而降低生物年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Fasting-mimicking-diet-reduces-biological-age-and-disease-risks-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Fasting-mimicking-diet-reduces-biological-age-and-disease-risks-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b4bbd3c-9da9-453a-b80b-b6c2c38205e1 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:14:25 -0500 Fasting-mimicking diet reduces biological age and disease risks, study shows
生命科学组织的全球端到端解决方案合作伙伴 AscellaHealth 加入曼彻斯特科学园为生命科学和生物技术制造商提供创新解决方案的全球医疗保健和专业制药解决方案公司 AscellaHealth 正在曼彻斯特科学园设立新办事处，扩大其在英国的业务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Global-end-to-end-solutions-partner-to-life-sciences-organizations-AscellaHealth-joins-Manchester-Science-Park.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Global-end-to-end-solutions-partner-to-life-sciences-organizations-AscellaHealth-joins-Manchester-Science-Park.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8bff139-1b06-45a1-83e2-b4b24c9751cf Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:08:00 -0500 Global end-to-end solutions partner to life sciences organisations, AscellaHealth, joins Manchester Science Park
揭示 CD24-Siglec10 轴在肿瘤免疫逃避中的作用宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。 CD24又称热稳定蛋白，是一种高度糖基化的糖基磷脂酰肌醇连接膜蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unveiling-the-role-of-CD24-Siglec10-axis-in-tumor-immune-evasion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Unveiling-the-role-of-CD24-Siglec10-axis-in-tumor-immune-evasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c874cae-36ca-4853-8f72-b5d014adce05 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:07:01 -0500 Unveiling the role of CD24-Siglec10 axis in tumor immune evasion
创新的肺部计算机模型可以详细模拟辐射效应人类肺部的创新计算机模型正在帮助科学家首次模拟辐射爆发如何在细胞水平上与器官相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Innovative-computer-model-of-the-lung-enables-detailed-simulation-of-radiation-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Innovative-computer-model-of-the-lung-enables-detailed-simulation-of-radiation-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b88d0751-ce5a-495c-8fa0-50d6c6cb06ff Tue, 20 Feb 2024 11:01:41 -0500 Innovative computer model of the lung enables detailed simulation of radiation effects
研究人员开发人工细胞环境以促进神经再生由于蛀牙会留下疤痕，中枢神经系统的损伤很难愈合。研究人员希望通过以干细胞在其中感觉舒适的方式填充空洞来解决这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Researchers-develop-artificial-cell-environment-to-promote-nerve-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Researchers-develop-artificial-cell-environment-to-promote-nerve-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb9eb898-a9d5-4c92-9b84-d4869a1b96f2 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:55:54 -0500 Researchers develop artificial cell environment to promote nerve regeneration
MIP Discovery 完成 700 万英镑 A 轮融资，以推动细胞和基因治疗领域的商业化公司的合成亲和试剂是抗体替代品，旨在提高大规模生产的速度、安全性和效率，使患者更容易获得先进的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/MIP-Discovery-closes-c2a37M-Series-A-financing-to-drive-commercialization-in-cell-and-gene-therapy-space.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/MIP-Discovery-closes-c2a37M-Series-A-financing-to-drive-commercialization-in-cell-and-gene-therapy-space.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2073ac27-515e-41bf-ae0c-dc1bc678bd50 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:49:00 -0500 MIP Discovery closes £7M Series A financing to drive commercialization in cell and gene therapy space
周末勇士锻炼方法堪比常规减肥锻炼肥胖协会 (TOS) 的旗舰期刊《肥胖》杂志上发表的一项新研究表明，无论您定期进行体育活动还是每周进行一到两天的体育活动，这两种选择都可以减轻体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Weekend-warrior-exercise-approach-comparable-to-regular-exercise-for-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Weekend-warrior-exercise-approach-comparable-to-regular-exercise-for-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb60a7f5-a08e-42b5-8dc5-1dc1caef4208 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 10:04:03 -0500 Weekend warrior exercise approach comparable to regular exercise for weight loss
超灵敏血液测试可预测中风患者的功能结果一种超灵敏的血液测试，可反映急性缺血性中风后的脑损伤，还可预测功能结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultra-sensitive-blood-test-predicts-功能性-结果-in-中风-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Ultra-sensitive-blood-test-predicts-功能性-结果-in-中风-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5b7bb57-49af-48df-a412-eaa70b78a264 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:56:00 -0500 Ultra-sensitive blood test predicts functional outcome in stroke patients
研究人员开发出装载遗传物质的新型纳米药物来对抗艾滋病毒在 COVID-19 大流行期间，当我们看到科学家和医疗专业人员利用 mRNA 的力量在一年内开发出针对该病毒的疫苗时，社会认识到了 mRNA 的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Researchers-develop-novel-nanomedicine-loaded-with-genic-material-to-fight-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Researchers-develop-novel-nanomedicine-loaded-with-genic-material-to-fight-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1e3a969-055f-4090-8b6a-ed41ffc5b3d8 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:49:28 -0500 Researchers develop novel nanomedicine loaded with genetic material to fight HIV
残余感觉异常影响脊髓型颈椎病术后患者满意度手脚发麻、突然发冷、灼热、瘙痒、四肢麻木——这些都是脊髓型颈椎病的感觉异常症状，是由于衰老或其他因素导致颈椎内的脊髓通路受压而引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Residual-paresthesia-impacts-病人-satisfaction-post-surgery-for-cervical-spondylotic-myelopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Residual-paresthesia-impacts-病人-satisfaction-post-surgery-for-cervical-spondylotic-myelopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ef5180c-9adf-4923-87c9-db9d5b19002e Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:44:00 -0500 Residual paresthesia impacts patient satisfaction post-surgery for cervical spondylotic myelopathy
